title: SEO Assistant
job_overview:
This is a full-time work-from-home position for SEO Assistant. Our company is based in Singapore and we help small businesses in Asia to improve their digital marketing on Google.

Requirements:
- Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm
- High speed and stable internet connection at home to be connected online at all times.
- Have personal laptop or computer.
- 100% computer based role. There is no need to speak to clients on phone or Zoom.
- Must be proficient in reading and writing in English.
- Basic computing skills such as Google docs, sheets, and emails.
- Familiar with using Google Chrome and the internet.
- Past experience in areas like SEO, SEM, digital marketing, WordPress, website design, blog writing is a must.

Job Scope:
- You will assist our SEO Team Lead to execute all SEO campaign tasks of our clients' projects.
- You will be trained in our internal process and will follow the steps provided by your Team Lead.
- You are required to follow the process 90% of the time, and with the remaining 10% allowing you to adjust accordingly to your best judgement for different situations.
- You will report directly to the Team Lead, who in turn reports to the director of the company.
